name: Compressor
description: Multichannel compressor with optional sidechain; operates as an insert effect (output replaces input).

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: Number of bus channels to process.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the output bus.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: The threshold at which gain reduction starts.

parameters.name: Ratio
parameters.description: The compression ratio. Exponential scaling from

parameters.name: 1:1 up to 1000:1. Attack
parameters.description: The attack time of the compressor. Exponential

parameters.name: Release
parameters.description: The release time of the compressor. Exponential

parameters.name: 0 1 0 Enables auto make-up gain, raising the gain automatically according to the threshold and ratio. Make-up gain The make-up gain, if "Auto make-up" is off. Lookahead
parameters.description: The lookahead time. Increase this to prevent the

parameters.name: -40.0 12.0 -40.0 dB Sets the amount of the sidechain signal mixed into the output. Sidechain solo
parameters.description: If enabled, the sidechain signal is passed through to

parameters.name: 1 28 The left or mono input bus. Right input
parameters.description: The right input bus, if stereo.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 The bus to use for the gain reduction output, scaled as 1V per 6dB of gain reduction. Reduction mode
